name: Overrun (Archmund)
description:
Overrun is a top down arena shooter, low poly style ƪ(ړײ)ƪ

Collect and defend your data chips from a horde of robots to escape from an exploding factory! Cooperate with your adversary to destroy them, but be first to collect ten chips to ensure your escape and victory!

  • Frenetic arena combat!
  • Cooperative-Competitive gameplay twist!
  • Nice low poly aesthetic (っ˘ڡ˘ς)
  • An electrifying theme!

_____________________________________________________________________

HOW TO PLAY?

  • Connect to a running game, wait for your adversary  ◔_◔
  • Step in the green box to initiate the countdown and release the hooooorde (ง '̀-'́)ง
  • Shoot the robots!!! (point with the mouse, left click to pew pew)
  • DON'T LET THEM TOUCH YOU, or you'll lose your precious chips (҂◡_◡)
  • Be faster and grab 10 to survive!
  • Profit

ヽ༼ ಠ益ಠ ༽ﾉ

_____________________________________________________________________

HOW TO START A GAME
There are three main ways to start a match from the main menu:

  1. JOIN SERVER:
    will connect to a live server running the game. Max 2 players;
    [will be taken down december 2021]
  2. JOIN WITH IP:
    will connect to the IP address typed in the box beside the button. To connect to a localhost game, just leave as is;
  3. HOST LOCALLY:
    start a local server and also connects as a client. Another instance of the game can connect to this match with the JOIN WITH IP button option;
